front.title: Coexistence between version 1 and version 2 of the Internet-standard Network Management Framework

abstract.t: The purpose of this document is to describe coexistence between version 2 of the Internet-standard Network Management Framework, termed the SNMP version 2 framework (SNMPv2) [1], and the original Internet-standard Network Management Framework (SNMPv1). [STANDARDS-TRACK]
